alert.note: Alert for East Otter Tail; West Becker; West Otter Tail (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 10 at 12:52PM CST until February 10 at 4:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, wet snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph leading to near blizzard conditions for an hour or two. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...West Becker, West Otter Tail and East Otter Tail Counties. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 4 PM CST this afternoon. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from midnight tonight to 9 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions as temperatures fall rapidly tonight. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: East Otter Tail; West Becker; West Otter Tail
